amendment.description: Amendment requires each agency promulgating a new rule to identify and repeal or amend an existing rule or rules to completely offset any annual costs of the new rule to the United States economy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 115-1 to require each agency promulgating a new rule to identify and repeal or amend an existing rule or rules to completely offset any annual costs of the new rule to the United States economy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Messer amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 185 (Roll no. 12).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Messer amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 185 (Roll no. 12).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Messer.
